divs: Sighting DetailsIn the summer of 2008 I was finishing an evening walk and noticed a strange orange light in the night sky. When I got home, I grabbed my video camera and started recording. Watch the video and notice the different colors from this object. Also watch around the 35 sec mark where another "object" appears and quickly disappears. I didn't have a tripod, so there is some camera movement. The video is slowed down but otherwise unaltered and is only a small part of the total recording. The jpg contains captures from the video. This object moved slowing in different directions before fading away.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Novi
There were no other sightings in Novi on or around June 20th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
